Welcome ot ER3. ER3 is a library that makes everyday task easier.

Commands:

|add(), sub(), mul(), div(), intdiv(), power(), modl()|
|value(), ip(), wait(), libs(), osc(), ls()|

1. Adds two nums, subtracts two, divides two, intdivs two, raises to power, modulus

2. Greater or Less Than, return ip, =time.sleep(), =pip freeze, =terminal command, =list directory.
